vulnerability.name: USN-4360-3
vulnerability.description: USN-4360-1 fixed a vulnerability in json-c. The security fix introduced a memory leak in some scenarios. This update reverts the security fix pending further investigation.  We apologize for the inconvenience.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that json-c incorrectly handled certain JSON files.  An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.

statements.status_notes: USN-4360-1 introduced a regression in json-c. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
